**Example 1: 删除实例日志备份**



Input: 

```
tccli postgres DeleteLogBackup --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --DBInstanceId postgres-2xmqduu9 \
    --LogBackupId 7b85234b-4f46-5047-b658-acb172074bf6
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "171aa9e7-c171-4ee1-8416-e69659f71f93"
    }
}
```
